title: Vertigo
description: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

title: Touch of Evil
description: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
description: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

title: The Defiant Ones
description: Two escaped convicts, one white and one black, are shackled together and must cooperate in order to survive.

title: Gigi
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship, but it may not stay platonic for long.

title: The Hidden Fortress
description: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

title: The Big Country
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A New Englander arrives in the Old West, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

title: A Night to Remember
description: On its maiden voyage in April 1912, the supposedly unsinkable RMS Titanic hits an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean.

title: Mon Oncle
description: Monsieur Hulot visits his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew in their ultra-modern house, causing chaos.

title: Ashes and Diamonds
description: A former Home Army soldier, now fighting for the anti-Communist underground, is ordered to assassinate a Communist district secretary.

title: Elevator to the Gallows
description: A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.

title: Big Deal on Madonna Street
description: A group of small-time thieves bungle the burglary of a pawnshop in Rome.

title: Dracula
description: Jonathan Harker begets the ire of Count Dracula after he accepts a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses.

title: The Fly
description: A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.

title: Separate Tables
description: Several people stay at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth, where they form relationships and reveal secrets.

title: I Want to Live!
description: A prostitute and perjurer is falsely accused of murder and faces the death penalty.

title: The Long, Hot Summer
description: Ben Quick is a suspected barn burner who arrives in a small Mississippi town and ingratiates himself with the town's richest family.

title: Auntie Mame
description: An orphan goes to live with his free-spirited aunt. Conflict ensues when the executor of his father's estate objects to the aunt's lifestyle.

title: The Young Lions
description: The destiny of three soldiers during World War II: a German officer, and two American soldiers.

title: Run Silent, Run Deep
description: A submarine captain obsessed with sinking a specific Japanese ship comes into conflict with his first officer and crew.

title: King Creole
description: A young man is denied his high school diploma because of a schoolyard fight and finds himself mixed up with bad company and a new career singing in a New Orleans nightclub.

title: Man of the West
description: A reformed outlaw is held hostage with a dance hall girl and a gambler by his former gang.

title: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
description: Sinbad must undertake a dangerous journey to the island of Colossa to break a spell cast on his princess by an evil magician.

title: The Vikings
description: Einar and Eric are two Viking half-brothers. The former is a great warrior whilst the other is an ex-slave, but neither knows the true identity of the other.

title: Bell, Book and Candle
description: A modern-day witch uses her powers to make a publisher fall in love with her, but runs into trouble when she actually falls for him.

title: Some Came Running
description: A veteran returns to his hometown in Indiana and deals with his family's hypocrisy and small-town gossip while being torn between two women.

title: The Old Man and the Sea
description: An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell ends when he hooks a colossal marlin, beginning a desperate battle to haul it in.

title: The Brothers Karamazov
description: Four brothers and their distinct personalities struggle with their overbearing father in 19th-century Russia.

title: Indiscreet
description: An American diplomat in London falls in love with a famous actress but pretends to be married to avoid commitment.

title: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
description: A British maid becomes a missionary in China and leads orphans to safety during the Japanese invasion.

title: The Last Hurrah
description: An aging, corrupt mayor runs for re-election for the last time.

title: Teacher's Pet
description: A newspaper editor clashes with a journalism teacher, but pretends to be a student in her class to prove experience beats education.

title: No Time for Sergeants
description: A hillbilly is drafted into the Air Force, where his naivety and literal-mindedness drive his superiors crazy.

title: South Pacific
description: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

title: The Tarnished Angels
description: A reporter becomes fascinated with a daredevil stunt pilot and his beautiful parachutist wife during the Depression.

title: A Time to Love and a Time to Die
description: A German soldier on furlough during WWII falls in love with a local girl while witnessing the devastation of his hometown.

title: The Left Handed Gun
description: A psychological take on the story of Billy the Kid, depicting him as a misunderstood youth seeking vengeance for the death of his mentor.

title: Thunder Road
description: A veteran of the Korean War returns home to the mountains of Tennessee and takes over the family moonshine business.

title: The Lineup
description: Two professional hitmen try to recover a heroin package carried by unsuspecting travelers in San Francisco.

title: Cowboy
description: A hotel clerk dreams of being a cowboy and gets his chance when he joins a cattle drive led by a tough trail boss.

title: The Matchmaker
description: A matchmaker tries to find a wife for a wealthy merchant but decides she wants him for herself.

title: The Blob
description: An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

title: It! The Terror from Beyond Space
description: A spaceship crew returns to Earth with a deadly alien creature on board.

title: Cairo Station
description: A lame newspaper seller obsessed with a beautiful woman turns to violence when she rejects him.

title: Equinox Flower
description: A father who is traditional about his own daughter's marriage is liberal about others' daughters.

title: The Music Room
description: A decadent zamindar (landlord) sacrifices his fortune to uphold his family prestige by hosting classical music soirees.

title: The Magician
description: A traveling magician and his troupe are challenged by skeptics in a small town.

title: Ivan the Terrible, Part II
description: The second part of Eisenstein's epic about Ivan the Terrible, depicting his struggle against the boyars.

title: Ice Cold in Alex
description: A group of soldiers and nurses must cross the desert in an ambulance to escape the advancing Germans.

title: Room at the Top
description: An ambitious young man from a working-class background schemes to marry a wealthy factory owner's daughter.
